item.title: API Docs | Annotorious OSD Plugin
item.description: API Reference: OpenSeadragon Plugin The OpenSeadragon Plugin is an extension to the OpenSeadragon zoomable image viewer. If you are looking for the standard version of Annotorious, which works with normal images embedded in websites, see here instead. Initialization When included via <script> tag: var anno = OpenSeadragon.Annotorious(viewer, config); With npm: import OpenSeadragon from 'openseadragon'; import * as Annotorious from '@recogito/annotorious-openseadragon'; import '@recogito/annotorious-openseadragon/dist/annotorious.min.css'; const viewer = OpenSeadragon({ id: "openseadragon", tileSources: { type: "image", url: "1280px-Hallstatt.
